definition: to choose/to pick/to sort out/to pick up

sentences.english: Those whom God leaves out of selection he is also reproving, and for no other reason than that he wills to exclude them.
sentences.chinese: 上帝如果不拣选你，没有别的原因，他就是把你放逐。

sentences.english: The teachings of Arminius got their start in the Holland because of the double election controversy.
sentences.chinese: 因为双重拣选的论战，阿民念的教导在荷兰开始。

sentences.english: Is it such a fast that I have chosen?
sentences.chinese: 这样禁食，岂是我所拣选使人刻苦己心的日子吗。

sentences.english: In the selection of Nathanael, the selection of Judas, and later Matthew was.
sentences.chinese: 在拣选拿但业之后，拣选了犹大，而后是马太。

sentences.english: In the selection of Nathanael, the selection of Judas, and later Matthew was.
sentences.chinese: 在拣选拿但业之后，拣选了犹大，而后是马太。

sentences.english: Consider now, for the Lord has chosen you to build a temple as a sanctuary.
sentences.chinese: 你当谨慎，因耶和华拣选你建造殿宇作为圣所。

sentences.english: He chose David his servant and took him from the sheep pens;
sentences.chinese: 又拣选他的仆人大卫，从羊圈中将他召来。

sentences.english: Jesus is taken by God or, better, chosen by God.
sentences.chinese: 耶稣被父派遣，更好的说法是被父拣选。

sentences.english: This selection and destiny are of the very God who calls, not of those who work.
sentences.chinese: 这拣选和定命乃是在于呼召的神，不在于作工的人。

sentences.english: Choose a man and have him come down to me.
sentences.chinese: 可以从你们中间拣选一人，使他下到我这里来。

sentences.english: But chose the tribe of Judah, the mount Zion which he loved.
sentences.chinese: 却拣选犹大支派，他所喜爱的锡安山。

sentences.english: He chose David also his servant, and took him from the sheepfolds
sentences.chinese: 又拣选他的仆人大卫，从羊圈中将他召来。

sentences.english: "I have chosen thee in the furnace of affliction." (Isa.
sentences.chinese: 你在苦难的炉中，我拣选你。

sentences.english: A vietnamese flower vendor sorts roses in hanoi .
sentences.chinese: 河内一名越南卖花小贩正在拣选玫瑰。

sentences.english: God's mercy is only for the chosen few.
sentences.chinese: 只有少又被拣选的人才得到神的悯。

sentences.english: But Paul choosing Silas, departed, being delivered by the brethren to the grace of God.
sentences.chinese: 保禄却拣选了息拉，蒙弟兄们将他托于主的恩宠以后。

definition: (third person pronoun for a divine being)
Jehovah (biblical name for God, Hebrew: YHWH)/compare Yahweh 雅威[Ya3 wei1] and God 上帝[Shang4 di4]
